articles.author: Simone McCarthy
articles.title: China’s Xi Jinping is visiting Europe for the first time in five years – his goodwill tour will be an uphill struggle - CNN
articles.description: When Chinese leader Xi Jinping arrived in Italy for a state visit in 2019, he was given a lavish welcome, with private tours of Roman landmarks and a dinner serenaded by opera singer Andrea Bocelli, topped with a crowning flourish – Italy’s decision to join X…
articles.content:
